title: Smart Data Models - WindTurbineType4bIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Wind turbine IEC Type 4A.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1, section 6.5.5.3.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindTurbineType4bIEC

WindContPType4bIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind control P type 4B model associated with this wind turbine type 4B model. Default: None

WindMechIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind mechanical model associated with this wind turbine Type 4B model. Default: None
